text: Haidar Najim (born 1 July 1967) is a former Iraqi football forward who played for Iraq in the 1998 FIFA World Cup qualification and 2002 FIFA World Cup qualification. He played for the national team between 1997 and 2001.https://web.archive.org/web/20120822143849/https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/archive/edition=1013/preliminaries/preliminary=895/matches/match=8466/report.htmlhttp://niiiis.com/players3.htmlhttp://www.rsssf.com/miscellaneous/iraq- recintlp.html ==Career statistics== ===International goals=== Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:100%;" !
